New expense reports occurring after the Cutover Date shall be administered in \\\"Concur Expense\\\" module, even if the request and travel parts were covered yet in the legacy system. For easier administration it is good to make sure legacy system administration and expense handling is as complete as possible before the Cutover Date.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Subcontractors will have access to only the one \\\"Concur Travel\\\" module to obtain information on EPAM global offers and benefit from Epam corporate discounts on accommodation, flights, car rent, trains (in some locations). However, contractors will not have virtual cards in the system and the payment should be on your own card and the invoice handling and expense reclaim should be processed on their own in the SimplePay system.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Concur Request\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to booking travel your request should be submitted and approved in Concur.
